feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.20
entry.content:
https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/445 - Added net tools for health check requests

What's Changed

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/447 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.19...6.5.20

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.6.0
entry.content:
Version 6.6.0 has a new setup screen and new options that allow user to select. Much of the code was change to make this work. Please report any issues. You still have to create an account, but the modes are respect after. (Feature Request https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/395)

Also the user menu has been updated to where the items are horizontal instead of vertical and wrap as space decrease.

Minor note, the wiki button points to new wiki pages (that are still under construction)

  1. Login Mode - Standard Username/Password
  2. Local ByPass Mode - Users can bypass login if coming from a local address
  3. No Login Mode - Users will always bypass he login screen. Utilized for reverse proxys

What's Changed

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/448

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.20...6.6.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.6.1
entry.content:
Lots of UI and Log Updates for 6.6.1

  • Fixed wording alignment on the setup page
  • Moved more scheduler spam into the debug log
  • Moved the authentication mode access spam into the debug log
  • Mobile mode for logs, removed the status, clear, and search box (still working, display issue)
  • Added thin lines along the sidebar and top portion of the top bar to provide a cleaner look
  • Improved top bar design
  • Enhanced the sidebar design
  • Shrunk the live hunts header
  • Enhanced the design style of the hunt cards on the front
  • Redesigned the appearance of apps and settings to a modern design

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.6.2
entry.content:
• Fixed .ico favorite icon for huntarr in Firefox (User Request - .ezek1el3000). Took me hours to add j/k

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.6.1...6.6.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.6.3
entry.content:
• Changed wording of General Settings to just settings to take up less space
  • (Mobile View) Fixed Apps header
  • (Mobile View) Settings and the save button only take up one line of space
